Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 4
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IV; sheet 5; Hieratic literary text verso and recto. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto 9-10-12; Verso 1-3. Recto: Monotheistic Hymns Verso: A Student's Miscellany
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner. Hieratic Papyri. Vol. 1, pp. 28-44, Vol. 2. Plate 16, Recto 9-10; Plate 17, Recto 11-12; Plate 18, Verso 1-2, Plate 19, Verso 3. The verso of this manuscript is available om T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/) This frame published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, pp. 170, 172
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381089) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381089)
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss, fractured Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk Displayed in Room 62 until 1999 Checked for loan to Japan 2002 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
